txt.en:
'With your help and the help of those Rangers... the Rangers, you came to me because of them didn't you? Well I should thank them, but now that I have my notes and focus, I want to get to the task of investigating these ruins.

'Would you be willing to make your way west down the hill to the Old Greenway Fort to tell that Andreg fellow that I am grateful for his assistance?

'You may want to make mention of the Orcs skulking about in the north too.'

'Oddvarr? I cannot say that I recall the name or the dwarf. If you say that he was forgetful, then perhaps he meant to send you on to Saeradan.\n\n'This other bit of news is disconcerting. We must investigate, I fear.'
Oddvarr finally remembered that he requested aid prior to your arrival.
Talk to Andreg at the Greenway Fort

Andreg is at the Old Greenway Fort, west of Hengstacer.\n\nOddvarr has asked you to tell the Ranger Andreg that he is grateful for the Rangers' assistance and that Orcs have come down from the eastern stretches of the North Downs as well.
